subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: In a wild contest that featured a disputed infield fly call and Chipper Jones’s final at-bat, St. Louis defeated the Atlanta Braves in baseball’s first play-in contest.
snippet: In a wild contest that featured a disputed infield fly call and Chipper Jones’s final at-bat, St. Louis defeated the Atlanta Braves in baseball’s first play-in contest.
